Name: Meat's Asp
Description:
This unique, sneaky cold-war era subcompact 9mm pistol has infiltrated H3VR! The ASP 9mm pistol features guttersnipe sights, transparent lexan side panels, and a 7 round single stack magazine.
The ASP can be found under automatic pistols.
A separate, larger picatinny guttersnipe sight can be found under the iron sights category.


I DO NOT recommend this pistol for any engagements beyond 15m without extensive practice or a high resolution VR headset. Please use this image: https://i.imgur.com/6qj6Zno.png as reference for aiming with the ASP's sight, straight from the manual.

Massive thanks to Tactical Loon for the model and Drummerdude2003 for the texturing.
